TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ji’an, title = Ji’an, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ji’an} }

S.FORM: Ji'an a sakuwan ku Hualien. kumud nu kalesakan, 62.65 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 0 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 0.68 km²), u kasabinawlan, 78,633 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 29,613 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 14,299 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 18%(Pangcah, Truku) ku kasabinawlan. u tademaw ilabu nu siyang u paylang ku alumanay. nikasakuwakuwan Ji'an mala 18 a cuwen atu 23 ku niyazu' kina 23 a niyazu'sa, Natawran , Pukpuk , Lidaw , Mabuwakay , Cikasuwan , Isaetipan pahikukian , Isawalian pahikukian , Taracan , Citekudan , Cikeliwan , Atonan , Ciripunan , Sarad , Kungkung , Hacining , Fulufuluan , Alang gnaalu , Alang mkibuhw , Alang kiyumi , Alang miyamay , Buner , Sirakesay , Ciyibangcalay . Ji'an/Yusinu (阿美語:Cikasuan；臺灣話:Kiat-an-hiong；臺灣客家語四縣腔:gidˋ onˊ hiongˊ,海陸腔:gid onˋ hiongˋ) . Ji'an/Yusinu , pangangan ku Cikasuan tu Pangcah/Amis, panagangan ku Kiat-an-hiong tu Taywan a tademaw, pangangan ku gidˋ onˊ hiongˊ tu se-sing-cang a kamu nu ngayngay , pangangan ku gid onˋ hiongˋ tu hay-lu a kamu nu ngayngay , tini i Taywan Kalinku a kenis nuwalian tu saamisan, nuwamisan micapi tu Kalinku a tuse, Walibatu satipan belaw u Siu-lin-siang nutimulan matatules nu Sou-bung-siang . lalabuay a tademaw pakala tu 8.4 a mang ku tademaw, nu Kalingkuay kenis a tademaw sakatusa nu tabakiay a tuse, u tademaw uyni dada' Kalingkuay nu hamin nu kanatal sakatuuday kenis a tademaw. ayzaay tu mihcaan Kalingku a sebu atu Taiwan Land Development Corporation (TLDC台開集團) saicelang sa palahat tu nutimulan Yusinu atu Kuan-hua-kung-ye-ci a kakitizaan, imahini maleku tu ku baluhay kapahay a idangan atu Huo-kuy Starbucks , VIESHOW CINEMAS , Huy-lan-wan a kakitizaan baluhay a tuse kenis malekutuay, paliayaw nizateng tu sakay nutimulan nuwamisan tu Yusinu balecad a malahat, mikelid tu satabakiay tu pipadang. hekal a lala' Ji'an/Yusinu a kenis hekal a lala pakala tu 15%, nuzuma 85% nu Yusinu a sauwac atu Mu-kua a sauwac masaupu masaenal,ahebal ku lala' masaenal, demiad tungus u kacacaledesay kabalian tu a demiad, labu nu kenis tademaw pasu layak, ngayngay, hulan, yincumin sepat ku tabakiay kasabinacadan, nilaculan anu canancanan nikalukan atu kusi misubayay a kawaw malecd tu macakat, tuse a kakitizaan u Kalingku malalutin tu makakat, kalankag kunikalahad, izaw ku Nuovo cinema Paradiso , VIESHOW CINEMAS , Huo-kuy Starbucks , McDonald's atu Poya sen-hou-kuan kenis a taduduan malalutin tu sapaliway a kawaw micumud tu pacakayay tu pabaliway. Ji'an/Yusinu i kasumamadan a Amis nu yincumin liwliw a pisakakawan , malumanay a ngangan "Cikasuan", u kamu nu Pangcah "Cikasoyay" katuudan a kakitizaan, nu Pangcah sakalima tabakiay a binacadan u Cikasuan han a kenis, Lilaw a kenis, Nadawlan a kenis, PukPuk' a kenis, pikuwanan henay nu Lipun a zitay, Cikasuan a kawaw hawsa, Cakasuan malasawad tu, 1910 a mihcaan Lipun Taywan sakakaay nu zebu paicelang tu Lipun pabulaw tu tademaw i Kalinku a kakitizaan, satu mili-yung tu Cakasuan patizang tu nu umahay, Cikasuan a niyazu'', tulu kuni kasiniyazu' nuayawan a a Yusinu, Tay-cang, Cing-bung, Pay-an, Sin-suay, Bu-sin, Taw-sian, Caw-ben, Yung-sin. 1920 a mihcaan tungusy nu Ci-ye kakitizaan Ci-ye a niyazu' nu Ping-ye a kenis "Lidaw, Natawlan, Puhpuh, 1937 a mihcaan nuwalian a kakitizaan pasumat tu lekec Ci-ye a kakitizaan papulung han tunu ayawan tuluay nipazengan tabakiay nisulitan Ci-ye-cang, Ci-ye, Nan-pu, Tan-pu, Cou-cin, makakenis panukas tu Kalinku a pikawawan a kakitizaan Kalingku a sakuwan "Cang-ting", zikuzan nu ngangayaw saayaway unian a ngangan, patizang Kalingku a kenis Ci-ye a niyazu' , nika zayhan mitapal tu, Ci-ye tusaay a sulit masaLipun kuyni kamu, kilul i 1948 a mihcaan ngangan Ji'an/Yusinu a kenis han katukuh ayza. tademaw pulung tuni sulitan katukuh i 2020年12月 a buladan, Ji'an/Yusinu a kenis u tademaw tu piasip 83,507 ku tademaw, kakatuud pakala tu 1,280 ku tademaw/km², nu hamin nu kanatal u sakatuuday a tademaw, sakapitu talakaway katuuday a kenis nu tademaw. caculilan Ji'an/Yusinu a kenis tini i Taywan Hua-lien a kenis nuwalian a sahedung tu nuwalian nuamisan a masaenalay saamisan micapi tu Hua-lien tuse, muwalibayu, satipan belaw u Siw-lin a kenis, nutimulan patatules nu Sou-bung a kenis, zayhan macapi ku Hua-lien kenis lihalay ku caculilan, micaliway tu silamalay Tay-tung a zazan atu Hua-lien a basu, Tay siwa a zazan, Tay sabaw cacay. silamalay a zazan i tini patizeng tu silamalay a Ji'an/Yusinu pangicuwan, basu a zazan kazizeng makay a Hua-lien a silamalay malingatu izaw ku Tay siwa a zazaan, Tay siwa pin, Tay sabawcacay a zazan, Hua-lien masahelungay pulung walu ku kazizengay a kapulungan a pihalhalan tu kazizeng , binawlan taneng mikakaw tu tabakiay miculuay taneng aca makay Hua-lien silamalay micaliw tu o-tu-bay atu batikal a tayza. nilaculan Ji'an/Yusinu a kenis tini i Mu-ka a sauwac atu Ji'an/Yusinu a sauwac tu masaupuay macebalay, ahebal ku masaenalay a hekal, taneng a kalukan ku lala' pakala tu lima a malebut kung-cin kaahebal, nu Hua-lin a kenis u anganagan nu malukay palumaan a lala', paluma tu tipus tubah tamulak kuhkuh sicedamay a daydan u teluc nu puki, u kulang atu caay ka yadah ku heci, uzauma u tali mahamin nu kanatal sakasepat sakayadahay nipalumaan a kakitizaan, u teluc nu puki, u saayaway kayadahay a nipalumaan nu kakitizaan hekal nu sapaluma macalap ku hamin nu Taywan 43%. tademaw a laylay Ji'an/Yusinu a kenis kasaupu nu binacadan pasu Layak a datemaw Layakay, Naynayan, Hulan, Amis atu Truku kutademaw, kasabinacadan masungaay a mapulung niak izaw kunuuzipan a lisin, caay kapiduduc tunu Layak a lisin, tuway tiniay a lalangawan masumad sangalep kayadah ku lalangawan. Kahulaman tu Kang-si tulu bataan izaw ku lima a mihcaan "celacan tu 1696 a mihcaan" tahkal i cudad "Taywan-bu-ze", nisulitan tu ce-ciw-suan-se-cung, mala u Ji'an/Yusinu lalabu u saayaway nisulitan i layly a cudan nu Yin-cu-min. tuud haku a Sing-ba-ke nisangaan a panan u singanganay nu misangaay a saydang a Lipun ci Wey-yan-wu u misaayaway a misanga', pakabayu mahamin nu kanatal kasatabakiay a minatu tu 29 a tuud a haku uangangan a sapisanga' a zayliyaw, pabeli tu baluhay a nikauzip, a patatungus han papulung a mapatungtuh tu tuud a haku mala tukinihay a Kin-ce-ta-sin, sakahuan-baw atu ayungan tu micidekay a nisangaan. tuud a haku pulung sepat a tatungduh ka talakaw, nika nu pahan tusa katadungduh dada', sakatulu sakasepat a tadungduh u pisanga' u sakakazalian dada'. u nipalumaan tali may-kuy lan-hua cyw-cay sicedamay a daydan deluc nu buki ciy-ye a belac kulang

Ji'an a sakowan ko Hoalien. komod no kalesakan, 62.65 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 0 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 0.68 km²), o kasabinawlan, 78,633 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 29,613 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 14,299 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 18%(Pangcah, Troko) ko kasabinawlan. o tademaw ilabo no siyang o paylang ko alomanay. nikasakowakowan Ji'an mala 18 a cowen ato 23 ko niyazo' kina 23 a niyazo'sa, Natawran , Pokpok , Lidaw , Mabowakay , Cikasowan , Isaetipan pahikokian , Isawalian pahikokian , Taracan , Citekodan , Cikeliwan , Atonan , Ciriponan , Sarad , Kongkong , Hacining , Folofoloan , Alang gnaalo , Alang mkibohw , Alang kiyomi , Alang miyamay , Boner , Sirakesay , Ciyibangcalay . Ji'an/Yosino (阿美語:Cikasoan；臺灣話:Kiat-an-hiong；臺灣客家語四縣腔:gidˋ onˊ hiongˊ,海陸腔:gid onˋ hiongˋ) . Ji'an/Yosino , pangangan ko Cikasoan to Pangcah/Amis, panagangan ko Kiat-an-hiong to Taywan a tademaw, pangangan ko gidˋ onˊ hiongˊ to se-sing-cang a kamo no ngayngay , pangangan ko gid onˋ hiongˋ to hay-lo a kamo no ngayngay , tini i Taywan Kalinko a kenis nowalian to saamisan, nowamisan micapi to Kalinko a tose, Walibato satipan belaw o Sio-lin-siang notimolan matatoles no Soo-bong-siang . lalaboay a tademaw pakala to 8.4 a mang ko tademaw, no Kalingkoay kenis a tademaw sakatosa no tabakiay a tose, o tademaw oyni dada' Kalingkoay no hamin no kanatal sakatooday kenis a tademaw. ayzaay to mihcaan Kalingko a sebo ato Taiwan Land Development Corporation (TLDC台開集團) saicelang sa palahat to notimolan Yosino ato Koan-hoa-kong-ye-ci a kakitizaan, imahini maleko to ko balohay kapahay a idangan ato Hoo-koy Starbocks , VIESHOW CINEMAS , Hoy-lan-wan a kakitizaan balohay a tose kenis malekotoay, paliayaw nizateng to sakay notimolan nowamisan to Yosino balecad a malahat, mikelid to satabakiay to pipadang. hekal a lala' Ji'an/Yosino a kenis hekal a lala pakala to 15%, nozoma 85% no Yosino a saowac ato Mo-koa a saowac masaopo masaenal,ahebal ko lala' masaenal, demiad tongos o kacacaledesay kabalian to a demiad, labo no kenis tademaw paso layak, ngayngay, holan, yincomin sepat ko tabakiay kasabinacadan, nilacolan ano canancanan nikalokan ato kosi misobayay a kawaw malecd to macakat, tose a kakitizaan o Kalingko malalotin to makakat, kalankag konikalahad, izaw ko Noovo cinema Paradiso , VIESHOW CINEMAS , Hoo-koy Starbocks , McDonald's ato Poya sen-hoo-koan kenis a tadodoan malalotin to sapaliway a kawaw micomod to pacakayay to pabaliway. Ji'an/Yosino i kasomamadan a Amis no yincomin liwliw a pisakakawan , malomanay a ngangan "Cikasoan", o kamo no Pangcah "Cikasoyay" katoodan a kakitizaan, no Pangcah sakalima tabakiay a binacadan o Cikasoan han a kenis, Lilaw a kenis, Nadawlan a kenis, PokPok' a kenis, pikowanan henay no Lipon a zitay, Cikasoan a kawaw hawsa, Cakasoan malasawad to, 1910 a mihcaan Lipon Taywan sakakaay no zebo paicelang to Lipon pabolaw to tademaw i Kalinko a kakitizaan, sato mili-yong to Cakasoan patizang to no omahay, Cikasoan a niyazo'', tolo koni kasiniyazo' noayawan a a Yosino, Tay-cang, Cing-bong, Pay-an, Sin-soay, Bo-sin, Taw-sian, Caw-ben, Yong-sin. 1920 a mihcaan tongosy no Ci-ye kakitizaan Ci-ye a niyazo' no Ping-ye a kenis "Lidaw, Natawlan, Pohpoh, 1937 a mihcaan nowalian a kakitizaan pasomat to lekec Ci-ye a kakitizaan papolong han tono ayawan toloay nipazengan tabakiay nisolitan Ci-ye-cang, Ci-ye, Nan-po, Tan-po, Coo-cin, makakenis panokas to Kalinko a pikawawan a kakitizaan Kalingko a sakowan "Cang-ting", zikozan no ngangayaw saayaway onian a ngangan, patizang Kalingko a kenis Ci-ye a niyazo' , nika zayhan mitapal to, Ci-ye tosaay a solit masaLipon koyni kamo, kilol i 1948 a mihcaan ngangan Ji'an/Yosino a kenis han katokoh ayza. tademaw polong toni solitan katokoh i 2020年12月 a boladan, Ji'an/Yosino a kenis o tademaw to piasip 83,507 ko tademaw, kakatood pakala to 1,280 ko tademaw/km², no hamin no kanatal o sakatooday a tademaw, sakapito talakaway katooday a kenis no tademaw. cacolilan Ji'an/Yosino a kenis tini i Taywan Hoa-lien a kenis nowalian a sahedong to nowalian noamisan a masaenalay saamisan micapi to Hoa-lien tose, mowalibayo, satipan belaw o Siw-lin a kenis, notimolan patatoles no Soo-bong a kenis, zayhan macapi ko Hoa-lien kenis lihalay ko cacolilan, micaliway to silamalay Tay-tong a zazan ato Hoa-lien a baso, Tay siwa a zazan, Tay sabaw cacay. silamalay a zazan i tini patizeng to silamalay a Ji'an/Yosino pangicowan, baso a zazan kazizeng makay a Hoa-lien a silamalay malingato izaw ko Tay siwa a zazaan, Tay siwa pin, Tay sabawcacay a zazan, Hoa-lien masahelongay polong walo ko kazizengay a kapolongan a pihalhalan to kazizeng , binawlan taneng mikakaw to tabakiay micoloay taneng aca makay Hoa-lien silamalay micaliw to o-to-bay ato batikal a tayza. nilacolan Ji'an/Yosino a kenis tini i Mo-ka a saowac ato Ji'an/Yosino a saowac to masaopoay macebalay, ahebal ko masaenalay a hekal, taneng a kalokan ko lala' pakala to lima a malebot kong-cin kaahebal, no Hoa-lin a kenis o anganagan no malokay palomaan a lala', paloma to tipos tobah tamolak kohkoh sicedamay a daydan o teloc no poki, o kolang ato caay ka yadah ko heci, ozaoma o tali mahamin no kanatal sakasepat sakayadahay nipalomaan a kakitizaan, o teloc no poki, o saayaway kayadahay a nipalomaan no kakitizaan hekal no sapaloma macalap ko hamin no Taywan 43%. tademaw a laylay Ji'an/Yosino a kenis kasaopo no binacadan paso Layak a datemaw Layakay, Naynayan, Holan, Amis ato Troko kotademaw, kasabinacadan masongaay a mapolong niak izaw konoozipan a lisin, caay kapidodoc tono Layak a lisin, toway tiniay a lalangawan masomad sangalep kayadah ko lalangawan. Kaholaman to Kang-si tolo bataan izaw ko lima a mihcaan "celacan to 1696 a mihcaan" tahkal i codad "Taywan-bo-ze", nisolitan to ce-ciw-soan-se-cong, mala o Ji'an/Yosino lalabo o saayaway nisolitan i layly a codan no Yin-co-min. tood hako a Sing-ba-ke nisangaan a panan o singanganay no misangaay a saydang a Lipon ci Wey-yan-wo o misaayaway a misanga', pakabayo mahamin no kanatal kasatabakiay a minato to 29 a tood a hako oangangan a sapisanga' a zayliyaw, pabeli to balohay a nikaozip, a patatongos han papolong a mapatongtoh to tood a hako mala tokinihay a Kin-ce-ta-sin, sakahoan-baw ato ayongan to micidekay a nisangaan. tood a hako polong sepat a tatongdoh ka talakaw, nika no pahan tosa katadongdoh dada', sakatolo sakasepat a tadongdoh o pisanga' o sakakazalian dada'. o nipalomaan tali may-koy lan-hoa cyw-cay sicedamay a daydan deloc no boki ciy-ye a belac kolang
